COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c
STRING: When I woke up, it was a time of day that probably
couldn't be considered morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158
STRING: I wasn't expecting to wake up to Phorni, staring over
the covers, saying something angrily at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192
STRING: [Phorni] “Weren't you supposed to be somewhere at
midday today?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a8
STRING: [Chris] “Morning...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da
STRING: [Phorni] “Don't 'morning' me!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f0
STRING: [Chris] “What am I supposed to say, then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222
STRING: [Phorni] “Just be quiet...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x242
STRING: I guess it wasn't the time to be playing around with
Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e
STRING: In an attempt to shake off my sleepiness, I got out of
bed quickly and prepared for my shower.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264
STRING: I had about thirty minutes until I was supposed to meet
Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x270
STRING: I didn't have much else besides my Fortelle to prepare,
so I had more than enough time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c8
STRING: It was hard not to feel there was something different
about everyone I passed that day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de
STRING: There were people who had already completed their
prayers for the day, and others who were on their way
to church now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f4
STRING: The Mass during Natale was different to those held on
other holidays, as all the church doors were opened
wide so that as many people as possible could
attend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x314
STRING: The ceremony itself was quite unceremonious. Priests
didn't read from the teachings, and neither bread nor
wine was given out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32a
STRING: However, the church was always filled with the sound of
hymns.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x336
STRING: And, perhaps this was the most troublesome thing of
all, one could line up to receive the Father's blessing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34c
STRING: Of course, as the church was open to the public, it was
possible to just go straight in and start praying, but it
was normal to wait,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 34c
STRING: in a line that stretched outside
depending on the time of day, for a blessing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c
STRING: For the past two years, Arietta and I had lined up and
received blessings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3aa
STRING: While waiting for Fal in front of the trattoria, a familiar
voice called out to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e4
STRING: [Torta] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fa
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, morning Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x418
STRING: [Torta] “What are you doing hanging around here? And
why in uniform?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42e
STRING: [Chris] “I'm waiting for someone...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x460
STRING: [Torta] “For Falsita?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x476
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... We're going to a recital later, and we
have to be formally dressed, which is why I'm in uniform.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b2
STRING: [Torta] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c8
STRING: [Chris] “What about you, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fa
STRING: [Torta] “I'm on my way to offer prayers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x528
STRING: You're going
too, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53e
STRING: [Chris] “More or less.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x570
STRING: [Torta] “More or less, huh...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59e
STRING: I guess I might see you
there, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5aa
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe, yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5dc
STRING: [Torta] “Well, I know you're not in a rush, but I wouldn't
want to hold you up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fc
STRING: Saying this, she waved her hand briefly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x608
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x63a
STRING: [Torta] “I know we don't have many chances to meet,
so if I don't see you at church, I guess I'll see you next
year?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65a
STRING: [Chris] “Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x678
STRING: [Torta] “See you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68e
STRING: [Chris] “Bye...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a8
STRING: I watched her walk off until she was out of sight, and
then I looked away as I turned around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6dc
STRING: [Fal] “Ah... Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6fa
STRING: [Chris] “M-Morning. Though, I think it's probably a little
late to be saying that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x736
STRING: [Fal] “That's true...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x74c
STRING: [Chris] “Did you just arrive?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77e
STRING: [Fal] “Umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x794
STRING: Fal glanced away for a moment as if she was
uncomfortable, but then made up her mind and spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c6
STRING: [Fal] “I got here just before.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7dc
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x80e
STRING: [Fal] “When you were speaking to Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x824
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry for making you have to walk on eggshells
like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x856
STRING: [Fal] “No, it's okay, I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86c
STRING: [Chris] “Don't worry about it. This is between Torta and
me, anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88a
STRING: [Fal] “She might have realized that too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a0
STRING: [Chris] “Which is why you don't need to worry about it...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8be
STRING: [Fal] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d4
STRING: [Chris] “So, what's the plan? Yesterday you said...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x906
STRING: [Fal] “That we'd go to church, and then the recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x91c
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? Wasn't there somewhere else you wanted
to go...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93a
STRING: [Fal] “Kind of, yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x950
STRING: [Chris] “Well... I guess we can do that later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x982
STRING: [Fal] “Shall we head to the church, for now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x998
STRING: [Chris] “We may as well, it's basically a yearly tradition,
after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa0c
STRING: [Fal] “I wonder if everyone who's walking in the same
direction as us now is heading to the church?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa2c
STRING: We continued chatting on our way to the church.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa38
STRING: [Chris] “Probably. Which means, we could be in for
quite a wait.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4e
STRING: I was surprised myself at how long it had been since I
last visited the New District.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa64
STRING: The streets we walked through and the church we were
headed to, were all built after more nobles moved into
this area.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7a
STRING: Perhaps because of that, it seemed too gaudy
compared to the Old District I had grown used to, and I
just couldn't take to it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa90
STRING: However, thinking that perhaps a girl would have a
different opinion, I cast my gaze at Fal, who was
walking beside me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaba
STRING: Surprisingly, she didn't seem particularly interested in
her surroundings, and kept her eyes forward as we
walked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaec
STRING: [Fal] “Hm...? Is something the matter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb02
STRING: [Chris] “No, I was just thinking it's been such a long time
since I visited the New District.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb34
STRING: [Fal] “Now that you mention it, it's been a long time for
me too. I don't get many chances to come here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6c
STRING: I
never do my shopping here, either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb78
STRING: [Chris] “Everything around here is expensive, huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbaa
STRING: [Fal] “Exactly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc0
STRING: It was just a little further to the church in the New
District.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbcc
STRING: In comparison to the number of people going to the
church, the number coming back was surprisingly small.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe2
STRING: The people who were deeply devout would enter the
church now, and remain there until early evening.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf8
STRING: I was starting to think we should have come earlier, but
it was a bit late for that now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc40
STRING: [Chris] “I'm not sure if I can be bothered anymore.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc72
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, really?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca0
STRING: To tell the truth, I was thinking the
same thing. We're in agreement, then. We're such
good partners!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb6
STRING: [Chris] “Partners that agree on the worst things.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce8
STRING: [Fal] “T-That's true...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfe
STRING: [Chris] “Well, anyway, why don't we keep going just a
little more?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd50
STRING: Now that we were this close to the church, the sheer
number of people was amazing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd5c
STRING: It was more like a cathedral than a church, and it could
hold a few thousand people.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd72
STRING: There were so many people that I thought the entire
town was here, and the number of people lined up at
the entrance was again, amazing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd88
STRING: However, as to be expected in a place like this, no one
was speaking in a loud voice, so there was a persistent
quietness about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc4
STRING: [Fal] “Hey...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdda
STRING: [Chris] “I know what you're thinking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0c
STRING: [Fal] “If we end up waiting in line, it might take over an
hour just for us to offer prayers.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2c
STRING: [Chris] “What do you want to do...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe5e
STRING: [Fal] “You've done this every year, right? How was it last
year, or the year before?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe7e
STRING: [Chris] “I came a bit earlier than this... Because of uh...
Who I was with.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeba
STRING: [Fal] “Ahh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed2
STRING: Turning away from the awkward silence that came, I
noticed that we had somehow ended up near the back
of the line.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee8
STRING: [Chris] “Let's wait in line for a bit longer...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf1a
STRING: [Fal] “Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf62
STRING: I suppose we waited over thirty minutes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6e
STRING: We were only at about the middle point of the line, and
there was no way to tell how much longer it would take
for us to enter, offer prayers, and receive
a blessing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf96
STRING: [Fal] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfac
STRING: Consumed by the silence, Fal spoke in a small voice,
and without making eye contact.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc2
STRING: [Chris] “What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe0
STRING: [Fal] “At this rate we're not going to make it to the
recital, so maybe we should just leave?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1000
STRING: Just when I thought I'd heard her small voice, I was
suddenly being pulled by the hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1032
STRING: [Fal] “We can pray anywhere, you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1048
STRING: Stumbling out of the line and returning to the place
where we started, I looked back and saw that our spot
had already been filled by a few people.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1068
STRING: [Chris] “F-Fal?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109a
STRING: [Fal] “If we spend any more time here, we're not going
to make it to the recital, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ba
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I know, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d8
STRING: [Fal] “Come on, over here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ee
STRING: While being dragged by the hand, I looked over my
shoulder for a moment, and saw Torta from the back,
standing in line.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112e
STRING: Distanced slightly from the main path people took, we
watched the line grow longer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x113a
STRING: [Chris] “What should we do about our prayers...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x116c
STRING: [Fal] “Why don't we just offer them here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1182
STRING: [Chris] “Without the Father present?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b4
STRING: [Fal] “It'll be okay. The Father of this cathedral is quite
renowned, so even if we aren't so close by, I'm sure he
will deliver our prayers.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d6
STRING: Saying this, she closed her eyes and placed her hands
together in front of her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ec
STRING: She murmured some simple lines of scripture that even I
knew, and I realized that she was really in prayer at this
point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1202
STRING: Natale was originally a celebration for offering prayers
to reaffirm our existence as “flesh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1218
STRING: Simply put, God was only a “spiritual” being; people
could not speak to God directly, nor even imagine him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122e
STRING: And, obsessed with things of the flesh, such as idols or
material wealth, many people would forget their
“spiritual” side.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1244
STRING: The reaffirmation of one's existence and the confessing
of one's acts were the objectives of Mass.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125a
STRING: And it was the Father who acted as a bridge between
man and God, delivering our prayers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1270
STRING: Which meant that going to church for confession should
have been more important than prayer...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a2
STRING: [Fal] “It'll be okay!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b8
STRING: She didn't seem to have any reasoning behind this, but
even so, she opened her eyes and smiled happily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e4
STRING: In the same manner as Fal, I closed my eyes and
reflected on myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12fa
STRING: It was impossible to put all those feelings into words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1306
STRING: First, I thought of Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1312
STRING: And then, Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x131e
STRING: Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x132a
STRING: And finally, I thought of Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1372
STRING: [Fal] “I guess that about covers it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1388
STRING: Fal, who from some point had been watching me,
commented mischievously as I opened my eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x139e
STRING: Of course it would be impossible for someone like me,
who wasn't a Father, to feel the presence of God, but
when I looked up at the massive church
in front of me,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 139e
STRING: I couldn't feel even a trace of his presence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13be
STRING: I felt that the smile in front of me held greater sway over
my heart at the moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d4
STRING: [Chris] “Shall we get going...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1406
STRING: [Fal] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x141c
STRING: From the corner of my eye I watched that familiar
silhouette enter the church, and then continued on my
way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1482
STRING: [Fal] “It's just about the right time for us to go.
Shall we?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a2
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b8
STRING: After walking through the New District a little and
spending time at the church, it had almost become time
for the doors to open.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150a
STRING: Unlike the church, the concert hall was not decorated
grandly at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1520
STRING: However, it did boast a certain functional beauty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152c
STRING: The building, designed with straight lines for
practicality, was still beautiful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1542
STRING: It seemed that the concert would be starting soon, as a
crowd had begun to gather.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1558
STRING: Seats were allocated to tickets for this recital, so there
wasn't a pressing need to hurry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x156e
STRING: Nevertheless, Fal said she wanted to head in early, so I
followed her lead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15bc
STRING: [Male] “Well then, if you'll excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ee
STRING: [Fal] “Thank you very much!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1604
STRING: A refined looking gentleman spoke to Fal, and then
went about his business.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x161a
STRING: [Chris] “Who was that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164c
STRING: [Fal] “I think it was an acquaintance of the school
director.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1662
STRING: [Chris] “You have those kind of connections...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1694
STRING: [Fal] “I've been tutored by him before, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16aa
STRING: After arriving at the hall, many people came up to us in
this same manner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c0
STRING: We got to our seats early, as the entrance hall was full
of people, but even then the number of people greeting
Fal didn't seem to change.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16de
STRING: [Cordell] “Hello Falsita. Oh, and who do we have here?
What a surprise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1712
STRING: [Chris] “G-Good afternoon, Miss.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1730
STRING: [Fal] “Good afternoon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174e
STRING: [Cordell] “Well, I suppose seeing the two of you here
together means that you really have decided to partner
up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x176e
STRING: [Chris] “You doubted us?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a0
STRING: [Cordell] “I wouldn't say that, however...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ce
STRING: Well, it doesn't
matter. I haven't heard you two perform together,
but perhaps you make an unexpectedly good pair.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180a
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, we are most aware of that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1820
STRING: Fal spoke in a voice full of confidence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182c
STRING: I simply nodded in the ambiguous way I always did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1854
STRING: [Cordell] “I see. Well then, no slacking off before the
recital, and keep up your practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1874
STRING: [Chris] “Yes Miss. Please don't start a lecture here,
okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b0
STRING: [Cordell] “I would never dream of it. Listening to good
music is also good experience for you. Well then, I don't
wish to bother you too much. If you'll excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18f6
STRING: [Fal] “Aha-ha. Enjoy the show.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x190c
STRING: [Chris] “Actually, Ms. Cordell...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x193e
STRING: [Cordell] “Come see me in the new year. I'll listen to you
play.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1962
STRING: Barely listening to what I was saying, Ms. Cordell simply
said what she wanted and left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1978
STRING: She always did this, even in places like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x198c
STRING: [Fal] “She's a good teacher.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a2
STRING: [Chris] “I suppose she is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19c0
STRING: The buzzer indicating that the show would soon begin
rang out through the hall, and the murmur of voices
went silent in an instant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d6
STRING: The hall would soon go dark, and the performance
would begin.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e2
STRING: [Chris] “I didn't end up getting a good chance to look at
the programme... What are they going to perform?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0a
STRING: [Fal] “You'll know when you hear it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a20
STRING: [Chris] “That's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a52
STRING: [Fal] “If I recall correctly, there are a lot of a capella
songs for the Mass.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a8a
STRING: It might be a nice alternative to
going to church.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa0
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac4
STRING: The hall soon filled with a tension unique to this kind of
event.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ad0
STRING: No one was speaking, but it was not completely silent
either, due to the small sounds of people coughing, or
their clothing rustling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aee
STRING: But after the applause for the conductor appearing on
stage and bowing, those small sounds became
insignificant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b14
STRING: I let the waves of beautiful music overcome me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b20
STRING: It was a completely different sensation to performing
the music myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b2c
STRING: I didn't become a part of the music, but instead felt the
mass of the music as one sound, with my entire body.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b42
STRING: It felt like not only my ears, but my skin and every part
of my body capable of sensing the waves of sound, had
become one big organ.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b58
STRING: I was unable to move until the last fragment of sound
was absorbed by the concert hall walls.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b9c
STRING: The first part of the programme had been concluded,
and the audience was given a five minute recess.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bb2
STRING: The excitement hadn't yet died down as I looked at Fal.
She wasn't smiling happily, nor was she shedding tears
of emotion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd2
STRING: [Chris] “Fal...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0c
STRING: [Fal] “Oh... Ah, yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c22
STRING: [Chris] “We have a five-minute recess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c54
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, I know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c6a
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, good. That performance was great,
wasn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c9c
STRING: [Fal] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cb2
STRING: [Chris] “Is something wrong...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce4
STRING: [Fal] “Ah, it's nothing. Anyway, I'm going to quickly go
to the bathroom before I miss my chance. You're okay,
Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I'm fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2c
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, then, excuse me for a sec.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d46
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d5c
STRING: In the end, Fal came back just as the second part of the
programme began, so we didn't get a chance to talk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da4
STRING: Once the entire programme had finished, many people
were already starting to head for the doors.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dba
STRING: Next to me, Fal just quietly stared at the stage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dc6
STRING: [Chris] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1df8
STRING: [Fal] “Nothing. Do you mind if we stay here a little
longer?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0e
STRING: [Chris] “No, we can stay as long as you like.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e40
STRING: [Fal] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e56
STRING: She thanked me almost curtly, and then went quiet
again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6c
STRING: As for me, I had no problems with just burying myself in
the soft cushioned chair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e82
STRING: After experiencing the recital, I was impressed anew at
how the Piova Communal School of Music was
producing such talented musicians.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e98
STRING: I was overwhelmed by a comfortable sense of
despondency once the recital had finished,
and my ears were still sharp,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 1e98
STRING: searching for any remnants of sound that could
have been lingering in the hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ed4
STRING: [Fal] “Alright... Shall we go?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eea
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? Oh, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f00
STRING: Fal seemed to have finally returned to her usual self,
and stood up as she spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f16
STRING: I followed her, and we headed outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f54
STRING: [Chris] “So, what's going on?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f8e
STRING: [Fal] “Hm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa4
STRING: [Chris] “You didn't enjoy the recital or something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fc2
STRING: [Fal] “What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fd8
STRING: [Chris] “I might just be imagining it, but you seem kind
of down since the recital finished.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2014
STRING: [Fal] “I do?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2042
STRING: Well, I guess I might be...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204e
STRING: At first Fal seemed surprised, but then she nodded as if
she were convinced.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206c
STRING: [Fal] “They were really good, weren't they?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2082
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. That's why I was kind of surprised that
you seemed unhappy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20be
STRING: [Fal] “No, that's not it. I'm not unhappy at all...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ec
STRING: Actually,
perhaps it would be appropriate to say that I was
unhappy about 'something.'”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2102
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2118
STRING: Looking about as if to check whether there were too
many people around or not, Fal smiled mischievously
and continued.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x214a
STRING: [Fal] “That reminds me, I said there was one more place
I wanted to drop by, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2160
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x217e
STRING: [Fal] “Let's go there, and then I'll tell you what I meant.
C'mon!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2194
STRING: [Chris] “Hey, wait a second!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21d6
STRING: The place that we half ran to reach was for some
reason, our school campus.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21ec
STRING: Perhaps because it was Natale, but even though the
practice rooms ought to have still been accessible, it
was strangely quiet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2202
STRING: We only passed a small number of students that were
heading home after finishing up their practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2218
STRING: We were walking in the opposite direction, towards the
school buildings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222c
STRING: [Chris] “It was the practice rooms that you wanted to
go to...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x225e
STRING: [Fal] “Hee hee.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2274
STRING: [Chris] “But even if that's the case, we don't even have
an hour to practice, do we?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x229c
STRING: [Fal] “Let me take care of that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22b2
STRING: [Chris] “Actually, I was planning on letting you do so
from the beginning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22d0
STRING: [Fal] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e6
STRING: [Chris] “Well, at least now I can justify carrying around
this heavy Fortelle all day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2322
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, shush.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2338
STRING: We stopped in front of the school building, and Fal
instructed me to wait there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x234e
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sure the practice rooms are still open, you
know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2380
STRING: [Fal] “Just wait, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2396
STRING: Upon saying this, Fal went inside the First Hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23d6
STRING: And then a few minutes later, she returned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23e2
STRING: When I went to enter the Second Hall, she called out to
me from behind, stopping me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2414
STRING: [Fal] “We're not going that way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x242a
STRING: [Chris] “So, we're going to the First Hall? You're up to
something, aren't you...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x245c
STRING: [Fal] “You're half correct.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x248a
STRING: Anyway, let's go!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2496
STRING: Fal stopped again, in between the two halls.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ac
STRING: [Chris] “Wait, you don't mean...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24de
STRING: [Fal] “What do you suppose I have right here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24f4
STRING: The ring of keys she held in her hand was clearly for
opening a very large door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2592
STRING: [Fal] “This is the place I wanted to drop by.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25a8
STRING: [Chris] “I'm impressed you could get your hands on
those keys...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c6
STRING: [Fal] “Hee hee.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25dc
STRING: Laughing, Fal continued inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2604
STRING: [Fal] “In about one month from now, we will be
standing on this stage, performing our recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x261a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2630
STRING: What she said had been deeply emotive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x263c
STRING: There had been a number of occasions in which I stood
on the stage by myself, but never had I performed there
with someone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2652
STRING: I suppose it was safe to say I felt a lot of responsibility.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x265e
STRING: Even if I hadn't practiced especially hard, I had always
managed to pull things off well thus far.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2674
STRING: I liked music and had been blessed with good teachers,
and had been more or less evaluated well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x268a
STRING: But this next performance wasn't only me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2696
STRING: And, it bore the potential to influence both of our
futures.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26ac
STRING: Perhaps I was glorifying it, but I thought that those who
were successful in this recital would later join
renowned orchestras,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 26ac
STRING: or at least get preferential treatment if they
wanted to become a music teacher in other countries.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26cc
STRING: Whatever it was that Fal aimed to become, I was sure
that succeeding here would be a prerequisite.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26e2
STRING: And since it was me whom she chose to be her partner,
I had to do my utmost.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2714
STRING: [Fal] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x272a
STRING: [Chris] “Nothing, just starting to feel a little nervous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x275c
STRING: [Fal] “I think you may be getting a little too ahead of
yourself there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2772
STRING: It wasn't that almost comfortable kind of nervousness
that one feels before a performance, but the type that
grips one's heart and makes it hard to breathe.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ae
STRING: [Fal] “To tell the truth... I feel it too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27c4
STRING: Just as she said that, she climbed up onto the stage and
extended her hand to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27f6
STRING: [Fal] “Come on.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x280c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x283c
STRING: The hall was silent, with no signs of life.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2848
STRING: My hand, still gripping Fal's, trembled ever so faintly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2854
STRING: However, her face showed no signs of fear; on the
contrary, it displayed a certain defiance, as if she were
about to take on a great challenge.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2886
STRING: [Fal] “Hey... Do you remember what we were just
talking about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x289c
STRING: [Chris] “About what I asked you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ba
STRING: [Fal] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28d0
STRING: [Chris] “Of course I do. You're going to tell me, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ee
STRING: [Fal] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2904
STRING: She eventually let go of my hand and stood in the
center of the stage, closing her eyes just as she did
when she sang.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2944
STRING: [Fal] “To be honest, I felt frustrated earlier.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x295a
STRING: Twiddling the pendant around her neck with her fingers.
she stared into the distance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2970
STRING: The pendant seemed special to her, as she never
seemed to take it off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2986
STRING: [Chris] “Why did you feel like that...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a4
STRING: [Fal] “After hearing a recital at that level of perfection,
how did you feel, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29c4
STRING: [Chris] “I thought they were incredible. Also, it
reinforced my feelings that I loved music.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29ec
STRING: [Fal] “Exactly... For me, it reinforced my feelings that I
am not at their level.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a0c
STRING: [Chris] “But Fal, you're still...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a2a
STRING: [Fal] “I know. But I want to be a professional, as soon
as humanly possible.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a4a
STRING: [Chris] “What, like straight after graduating?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a68
STRING: [Fal] “That's right. I want to make a living from singing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a7e
STRING: [Chris] “If anyone can do it, it's you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a9c
STRING: [Fal] “I wonder...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ab2
STRING: [Chris] “I mean, you're...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ad0
STRING: [Fal] “Sorry, the way I said that was misleading. I think I
can imagine what you were going to say next. I'll
rephrase my question.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2afa
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b18
STRING: [Fal] “What is it that I'm lacking?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b2e
STRING: [Chris] “The thing that you lack...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b4c
STRING: [Fal] “We talked about it before, didn't we? And at that
time, you didn't disagree.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b6c
STRING: [Chris] “That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b8a
STRING: [Fal] “If it were only me, I could have disregarded it as
just my imagination, but if you have the same opinion as
me, it can't just be something I'm imagining.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2baa
STRING: Those words especially rang true for me after hearing
what Phorni said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bc8
STRING: [Fal] “You don't know what it is either though,
do you...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bde
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bfc
STRING: [Fal] “Don't be. But, this is why I want to perform the
recital with you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c1c
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c60
STRING: [Fal] “So, please continue to help me, from here on in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c76
STRING: [Chris] “Likewise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c8c
STRING: “From here on in?” Did she just mean the recital?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c98
STRING: Or did she mean beyond that?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ca4
STRING: I smiled evasively, and broke eye contact to hide the
flush I felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cde
STRING: [Fal] “Now... Since we're here on stage, shall we
rehearse a little?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cfe
STRING: [Chris] “I had a feeling you were going to say that. I'll
set up immediately.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d1c
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, I'll be warming up in the meantime.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d5e
STRING: I finished getting ready, and we took our places on
stage as if it were a proper recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d6a
STRING: I played the first note for her, and she started humming
in tune with it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d80
STRING: Being in the center of the light on stage, we could
barely see as far as the seats for the audience.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d96
STRING: Her eyes met mine, and our music began the moment
we synchronized our timing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dcc
STRING: Her voice was clear, and being right next to her I could
hear it well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dd8
STRING: Our eyes met at each turn in the song, and we matched
our timing perfectly for each progression.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dee
STRING: Matching the pianissimo of the song, she gently
rounded her shoulders, and in response to that I
lightened the pressure I put into my fingertips.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e04
STRING: The two of us could do what a duo without a conductor
needed to do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e1a
STRING: I felt a sense of being as one, different to what I had
felt earlier as a member of the audience.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e76
STRING: [Fal] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e8c
STRING: [Chris] “You look like you feel better now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ebe
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, that's because I do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ed4
STRING: Had it just been the pressure...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ee0
STRING: She had been aware for a long time that she was
lacking something, and she had undoubtedly been
practicing like crazy in order to make up for
whatever it was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f00
STRING: And now, frantically trying to deal with it all on her own.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f16
STRING: Of course, this was nothing more than my own
speculation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f22
STRING: But I thought that by performing together and sharing
part of that burden, it would be marvelous if I could
help her find what it was that she had been seeking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f5e
STRING: [Fal] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f74
STRING: [Chris] “There's no need to thank me. But... If you really
feel you have to, just thank me after we do a good job
of the graduation recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f94
STRING: There wasn't even the slightest need for her to thank
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fa0
STRING: It was me who had to thank her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fac
STRING: There was something I had felt back when I liked music
even more than I did now...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fb8
STRING: It wasn't just because it had been fun, but also because
I wanted to play better. It was a feeling of the purest
kind that only a child could feel.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fce
STRING: Thanks to Fal, I could remember that feeling now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ff6
STRING: [Fal] “I guess it's about time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x300c
STRING: [Chris] “Umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3022
STRING: Upon looking at the clock on the wall, I saw that it was
well past eight.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3038
STRING: [Chris] “This might be a problem... Ah, but since you're
here, I suppose we'll be okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3074
STRING: [Fal] “Sorry... We might get in trouble.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x308a
STRING: [Chris] “What?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30a8
STRING: [Fal] “I told them we'd be gone before eight...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30be
STRING: [Chris] “You told that to one of the teachers?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30f0
STRING: [Fal] “The security guard.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x311e
STRING: It's supposed to be Natale...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x312a
STRING: [Chris] “In that case, we'd better hurry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3148
STRING: [Fal] “Sorry, you might get in trouble too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x315e
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? Oh, well, less of the blame will end up on
you if I'm there, so it's all good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x319a
STRING: [Fal] “Hehe...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3208
STRING: [Fal] “I glad we didn't get in too much trouble.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x321e
STRING: [Chris] “With you around, the school starts to seem like
a different place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x325a
STRING: [Fal] “Why is that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3270
STRING: [Chris] “It was a long time ago, but I got in trouble with
the security guard once. I think it was when Asino and I
went to get something that he left at school.”
[Chris] “We got caught and the guard really went off
at us.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32a2
STRING: [Fal] “Shouldn't you have just explained why you
needed to go in?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32b8
STRING: [Chris] “We did... But the guard didn't listen, so we
sneaked in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32f4
STRING: [Fal] “How strange, I always thought he was a nice guy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x330a
STRING: [Chris] “He probably is to you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x333c
STRING: [Fal] “What is that supposed to mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3352
STRING: [Chris] “It's a compliment.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3384
STRING: [Fal] “It doesn't sound like one.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x339a
STRING: [Chris] “In that case you should rethink it until it sounds
more like one.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33b8
STRING: [Fal] “Grr...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33e6
STRING: Oh, by the way, are you getting hungry?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33f2
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Yeah... Now that you mention it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3408
STRING: I realized I was actually quite hungry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3414
STRING: I hadn't had any time to eat in the morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x343c
STRING: [Fal] “Do you want to have dinner at my place? I've
already prepared it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3452
STRING: [Chris] “Just what have you prepared...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3484
STRING: [Fal] “Copert's specialty lasagna.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34b2
STRING: All I have to do is
bake it, and it'll be ready!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34c8
STRING: [Chris] “Gah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34de
STRING: Perhaps it was because I had eaten it twice before, but I
could already taste it in my mouth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34ea
STRING: My hunger suddenly became one notch stronger.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34f6
STRING: [Chris] “If you've already made it, then there's no way I
could say no.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3528
STRING: [Fal] “I made a lot, so feel free to have seconds.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x356a
STRING: The evening of Natale wasn't quiet for us, but it was
peaceful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3580
STRING: Fal planned to visit her family, and was going to come
back by overnight train one day before classes started
again, on the 3rd.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3596
STRING: It was very like her to want to fit some practice in on
that day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35a2
STRING: It wasn't as if I had plans, so I couldn't say no.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3604
STRING: [Fal] “We have to at least do a little practice,
you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x361a
STRING: [Chris] “I know. Look, it's getting late and it's going to
get cold tonight so we should head back soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3656
STRING: [Fal] “Do you really understand...? Well, as long as you
do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x366c
STRING: [Chris] “I would say the same goes for you... But it
wouldn't be very convincing, would it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x369e
STRING: [Fal] “You don't need to worry about me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36b4
STRING: [Chris] “I know that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36e6
STRING: [Fal] “Aha-ha. Anyway, you'll come to the station when I
arrive, won't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3706
STRING: [Chris] “At two o'clock..”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3724
STRING: [Fal] “Thanks. I want to get back into the swing of
things as soon as possible.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x373a
STRING: [Chris] “Roger that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3758
STRING: [Fal] “Aha-ha. Okay then, see you when I get back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x376e
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, see you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37f6
STRING: Dear Chris. I wonder, is it still raining there as you read
this letter?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x380c
STRING: The weather here is lovely, as usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3820
STRING: It's Natale today, and I wonder, did you go to church
and pray?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x383e
STRING: Up until last year we'd always spent Natale together, so
I'm a bit worried about this year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x385c
STRING: I know you're not a morning person, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3870
STRING: You must have gone in the afternoon, I guess.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3886
STRING: That's about when I went to pray too, and I hope our
thoughts were together as one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38a4
STRING: This is my last letter for the year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38b8
STRING: In any case, next year's letter will be there very soon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38d8
STRING: Recently, I've been thinking a lot about the last time you
came back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38f6
STRING: I hope that nothing's changed, even though we can't
meet this year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x390a
STRING: I wonder if you've learned and become a better
musician at the school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3928
STRING: I also want to hear you play the Fortelle, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x393c
STRING: I want to hear it so much that it makes me cry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3950
STRING: Speaking of which, I guess you've picked someone
other than Torta to be your graduation recital partner?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x396e
STRING: It was a little unexpected, but if that's your decision,
then I think it's for the best.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x398c
STRING: I am so far away, and who can say what things may
change by the time this letter gets to you...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39aa
STRING: But I know one thing for sure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39be
STRING: Chris, do what you think is right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39d2
STRING: No matter what that may be.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39e8
STRING: I am my own person, as are you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39fc
STRING: As long as you choose your path carefully, there is
nothing that I will not accept.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a1a
STRING: And so, if you are ever at a loss, remember my words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a38
STRING: Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a4c
STRING: Do what you think is right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a60
STRING: That is my only, true wish.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a74
STRING: Until next year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a90
STRING: Arietta
